summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff introduces multiple new backend systems and updates project_state.json with a new feature request.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an access control system initialization/state and related authorization dependency.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; this is new functionality added beyond any stated scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added likes data structures for posts and ribbits.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Added an activity tracking system (recent activity) including Activity/ActivityType types and multiple activity maps.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Added tag statistics tracking structures (tagStats, TagStats type, tag usage/merge registries).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project state metadata describing a new request to remove authentication requirements for anonymous usage (AR-1).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists no requirements; this adds a new feature request not present in the source-of-truth BuildRequest.
